entities.name: room 431
entities.description: The room where the conversation is taking place. ("T HE UNKNOWABLE ROOM 431")

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Harry Potter's name mentioned by Professor Snape. ("Potter.")

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: A student who lets out a high-pitched giggle at Harry's comment. ("Pansy Parkinson let out a high-pitched giggle.")

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Professor Snape who is sneering at Harry's comment. ("‘A five-year-old could have told us as much,’ sneered Snape.")

entities.name: inferi
entities.description: Dead bodies reanimated by a Dark wizard's spells. ("The Inferius is a corpse that has been reanimated by a Dark wizard’s spells.")

entities.name: ghosts
entities.description: Imprint of a departed soul left upon the earth. ("A ghost, as I trust that you are all aware by now , is the imprint of a departed soul left upon the earth ... and of course, as Potter so wisely tells us, transparent.")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who comments on Harry's statement. ("‘Well, what Harry said is the most useful if we’re trying to tell them apart!’ said Ron.")

relationships.description: Harry Potter explains that Inferi are solid because they are dead bodies. ("Yeah, ghosts are transparent, but Inferi are dead bodies, aren’t they? So they’d be solid –")
Harry Potter explains that ghosts are transparent. ("Yeah, ghosts are transparent,")

Professor Snape explains that Inferi are not alive but used like a puppet. ("The Inferius is a corpse that has been reanimated by a Dark wizard’s spells. It is not alive, it is merely used like a puppet to do the wizard’s bidding.")

Professor Snape explains that ghosts are the imprint of a departed soul. ("A ghost, as I trust that you are all aware by now , is the imprint of a departed soul left upon the earth ... and of course, as Potter so wisely tells us, transparent.")
Ron agrees with Harry's statement. ("‘Well, what Harry said is the most useful if we’re trying to tell them apart!’ said Ron.")
